Name: Naming of ferries.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the naming of ferries.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section one.  Title 19 of the administrative code is amended by adding a new section 19-307 to read as follows:
Section 19-307.  Naming of ferries.  The council shall by resolution name any ferry operated by the city of New York and put into service on or after January 1, 2007.  The commissioner shall notify the council of any ferry at least one hundred twenty days before such ferry is scheduled to go into service.  The council shall pass such resolution within this one hundred twenty day period; provided that if the council fails to act within such period, the commissioner shall be authorized to name such ferry.
Â§ 2 .  This local law shall take effect immediately.
PH
LS # 729
6.21.06, -- 11 am
